item.title: Very poor workmanship, 30th September
item.description:
Walking along Chosen Drive this morning I noticed the material used to patch potholes only a week or so ago had the consistency of black porridge still soft and pliable. In several places it has squidged out where the tyres of vehicles have passed over. Some holes look like the material was just sprinkled over and left, several holes were not even filled flush with the surrounding road surface. In one hole the material had obviously lifted out on the tyre of a passing vehicle. If this is the standard of pot hole repair being applied no wonder the situation never seems to improve. John Wright
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
